Enums/GS1EncoderError.html.name: GS1EncoderError
Enums/GS1EncoderError.html.abstract: Custom error types for GS1 Encoder operations.

Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html#/s:11.name: RepeatedAIs
Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html#/s:11.abstract: Repeated AIs having same value (locked: always enabled)

Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html#/s:11.abstract: Serialisation qualifier AIs must be present with Digital Signature (locked: always enabled)

Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html#/s:11.abstract: Unknown AIs not permitted as GS1 DL URI data attributes

Classes/GS1Encoder/Symbology.html.abstract: Recognised GS1 barcode formats (“symbologies”) for processing scan data.

Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html.name: Validation
Classes/GS1Encoder/Validation.html.abstract: Optional AI validation procedures that may be applied to detect invalid inputs.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Release library resources.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the version string of the library.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setSym(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the symbology type.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getAddCheckDigit()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the current status of the “add check digit” mode for EAN/UPC and GS1 DataBar symbols.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setAddCheckDigit(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Enable or disable “add check digit” mode for EAN/UPC and GS1 DataBar symbols.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getIncludeDataTitlesInHRI()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the status of the “include data titles in HRI” flag.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setIncludeDataTitlesInHRI(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the “include data titles in HRI” flag.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getPermitUnknownAIs()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the status of the “permit unknown AIs” mode.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setPermitUnknownAIs(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the “permit unknown AIs” mode.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getPermitZeroSuppressedGTINinDLuris()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the status of the “permit zero-suppressed GTIN in GS1 DL URIs” mode.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setPermitZeroSuppressedGTINinDLuris(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the status of the “permit zero-suppressed GTIN in GS1 DL URIs” mode.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getValidationEnabled(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get whether a specific validation procedure is enabled.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setValidationEnabled(validation:enabled:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Enable or disable a specific validation procedure.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the “validate AI associations” flag.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setValidateAIassociations(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the “validate AI associations” flag.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getDataStr()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the raw barcode message data.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setDataStr(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the raw barcode message data.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getAIdataStr()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the AI data as a bracketed AI element string.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setAIdataStr(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the AI data using a bracketed AI element string.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getScanData()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the scan data.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: setScanData(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Set the scan data.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getErrMarkup()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the error markup generated when parsing AI data fails due to a linting failure.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getDLuri(_:)
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get a GS1 Digital Link URI that represents the AI-based input data.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getHRI()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the Human-Readable Interpretation (HRI) text for the current AI data as an array of strings.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.name: getDLignoredQueryParams()
Classes/GS1Encoder.html#/s:11GS1Encoders.abstract: Get the non-numeric (ignored) query parameters from a GS1 Digital Link URI as an array of strings.

Classes/GS1Encoder.html.name: GS1Encoder
Classes/GS1Encoder.html.abstract: Main class for processing GS1 barcode data, including validation, format conversion, and generation of outputs such as GS1 Digital Link URIs and Human-Readable Interpretation text.
